Former Penn State running back Saquon Barkley who now plays for the New York Giants gives an interview on the field during the Penn State BlueWhite game at Beaver Stadium on Saturday April   PERIOD

Forbes recently released a list of the worlds highest paid athletes and Saquon Barkley was one of only three athletes to make the cut from New Yorkbased teams PERIOD

Barkley comes in at No PERIOD  on the list behind boxer Manny Pacquiao and just ahead of Boston Red Sox slugger J.D PERIOD Martinez PERIOD

At the age of  Barkley has already amassed nearly  million in total earnings including . million in endorsements PERIOD Barkley had an excellent rookie season for the New York Giants winning Rookie of the Year and looks to be a cornerstone of the struggling franchise for years to come PERIOD

Barkleys former teammate on the Giants Odell Beckham now with the Browns is ranked No PERIOD  PERIOD On a list that is dominated by American sports athletes soccer superstars Lionel Messi No PERIOD  with  million and Cristiano Ronaldo No PERIOD  with  million stood alone in the top two positions PERIOD
